name.description: The name of the new directive.
name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the directive?

directory.description: The directory at which to create the directive file. When `--nameAndDirectoryFormat=as-provided`, it will be relative to the current working directory. Otherwise, it will be relative to the workspace root.

nameAndDirectoryFormat.description: Whether to generate the directive in the directory as provided, relative to the current working directory and ignoring the project (`as-provided`) or generate it using the project and directory relative to the workspace root (`derived`).

project.x-deprecated: Provide the `directory` option instead and use the `as-provided` format. The project will be determined from the directory provided. It will be removed in Nx v20.

prefix.description: A prefix to apply to generated selectors.

skipTests.description: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the new class.

skipImport.description: Do not import this directive into the owning NgModule.

selector.description: The HTML selector to use for this directive.

standalone.description: Whether the generated directive is standalone.

flat.description: When true (the default), creates the new files at the top level of the current project.
flat.x-deprecated: Provide the `directory` option instead and use the `as-provided` format. It will be removed in Nx v20.

module.description: The filename of the declaring NgModule.

export.description: The declaring NgModule exports this directive.
